message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_FV_PARSING_XML_ERROR
message.locale: The errors encountered while parsing the XML string.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_FV_FILE_MUST_BE_XML
message.locale: The File must be in the XML format.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_XML_CANNOT_VALIDATE_AGAINST_XSD
message.locale: The selected XML file cannot be successfully validated against the schema definition.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_XML_CANNOT_IMPORT_VERSION_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Taxonomy version %1s is already imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_XML_CANNOT_IMPORT_WITH_LOWER_VERSION
message.locale: A later version, %1s, of the taxonomy exists. The file cannot be imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_FV_VERSION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Version Number must not exceed %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_VERSION_WITH_INEDIT_EXISTS_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: Taxonomy version %1s in In Edit, the file cannot be imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_TERMS_WITH_INEDIT_EXISTS_FOR_VERSION_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: There are In Edit terms for the version %1s, the file cannot be imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_VERSION_IMPORT_INPROGRESS_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: The taxonomy version %1s is being imported, the file cannot be imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_VERSION_PUBLISH_INPROGRESS_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: The taxonomy version %1s is being published, the file cannot be imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_IN_EDIT_TERMS_EXIST_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: The current version has terms that are not yet published, a new version cannot be imported. Please publish or delete the terms.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_DIFFERENT_COUNTRY_TAXONOMY_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: The current taxonomy has terms defined for %1c, a taxonomy with terms defined for another country cannot be imported.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_SCHEMA_VERSION_USED_FOR_IMPORT
message.locale: The current version of the XSD file is %1s. Please upload a new XSD file if you wish to use a different version.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_SCHEMA_VERSION_NOT_EXISTS
message.locale: The XSD file is not available, the XML cannot be validated.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_VERSION_NOT_IN_EDIT_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The taxonomy version %1s is '%2c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_VERSION_NOT_IN_EDIT_CANNOT_PUBLISH
message.locale: The taxonomy version %1s is '%2c', it cannot be published.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_TRANSLATION_NOT_AVAILABLE_FOR_LATEST_VERSION
message.locale: %1c translation is not available for the latest published version, %2s. The translation cannot be imported.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_PUBLISH_TRANSLATIONS
message.locale: Translations in the following language(s) are not available for this version to be published - %1s.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_VERSION_UNDER_REVIEW_CANNOT_IMPORT
message.locale: The %1s version of the taxonomy %2s is pending user review, the file cannot be imported.

message.name: ERR_TAXONOMYVERSION_XRV_XML_CANNOT_CREATE_VERSION_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Taxonomy version %1s already exists.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMY_VERSION_PUBLISH_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: The taxonomy cannot be edited as the version is currently being published.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMY_VERSION_REPUBLISH_REQUIRED
message.locale: Changes have been made to the published version %1s. Please publish the version again.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYTERM_IMPORT_TRANSLATION_LANGUAGE_ALREADY_SUBMITTED
message.locale: %1c, translation for version, %2s, has been submitted for import.

message.name: INF_TAXONOMYVERSION_DELETE_EXISTING_VERSION
message.locale: Publishing this version will result in the deletion of version %1s.
